attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: which would enable all current MPs to approach their constituencies as honest, able men or women of moral integrity to stand for re-selection and to be put before the voters submitting their credentials especially in the light of this sordid expenses affair. People feel badly let down and angered by politicians who must recognise that our nation contains fine minds, great talents, proud histories and traditions, and a wonderful sense of tolerance and inclusion.  Voters deserve to be represented by members with passion, belief and commitment.  Politicians of this ilk currently sitting in the House should have nothing to fear; they should trust the good sense of the British electorate for fair play.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
